description: Try our easy to follow Lobster with Coconut, Lime & Lemongrass Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lobster dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lobster with Coconut, Lime & Lemongrass Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs palm sugar, grated (or brown sugar)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a sharp knife, carefully cut 3 lobsters in half lengthways. Clean. Spread crushed ice onto a large serving platter. Place lobster halves onto platter and serve with dressing below.
For dressing finely chop the white portion of a stalk of lemongrass. Combine coconut milk, desiccated coconut, fish sauce, palm or brown sugar and finely grated rind and lime juice.
